## getApiConfigFromEnv() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Configuration helper function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getApiConfigFromEnv(): ApiConfiguration;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[ApiConfiguration](./teamsfx.apiconfiguration.md)

API configuration which is constructed from predefined env variables.
